name: BJ's Wholesale Club Holdings, Inc.
description: BJ's Wholesale Club Holdings, Inc. is a leading operator of membership-only warehouse clubs in the United States. Founded in 1984 and headquartered in Westborough, Massachusetts, BJ's provides its members with a wide selection of groceries, general merchandise, and services at competitive prices. The company operates over 200 clubs across 17 states, offering a unique shopping experience that combines quality products with a focus on value. BJ's is known for its commitment to serving its members with a diverse range of products, including fresh food, household essentials, electronics, and seasonal items. The company also emphasizes its private label brand, Berkley Jensen, which offers high-quality products at lower prices. Additionally, BJ's Wholesale Club has been expanding its online shopping capabilities, providing convenient delivery and pickup options to meet the evolving needs of its customers. With a strong focus on customer satisfaction and value, BJ's aims to deliver a compelling shopping experience that encourages member loyalty. The company is dedicated to sustainability and community involvement, striving to make a positive impact on the environment and the neighborhoods it serves.

seo.meta_title: BJ's Wholesale Club | Membership-Only Warehouse Clubs
seo.meta_description: BJ's Wholesale Club offers a unique shopping experience with a wide selection of groceries and merchandise at competitive prices. Join BJ's for great value and savings.

faq.answer: BJ's is headquartered in Westborough, Massachusetts, USA.

faq.question: What are the main product categories at BJ's?
faq.answer: BJ's offers groceries, general merchandise, electronics, clothing, and more.

faq.answer: BJ's Wholesale Club was founded in 1984.
